StoppedState.Title: Not Fasting
StoppedState.Description: Eat well and prepare for your next fast.

Stages.Title: Anabolic Phase
Stages.Description: Your body is digesting food and storing energy.

Stages.Title: Catabolic Phase
Stages.Description: Blood sugar falls. Body starts looking for stored energy.

Stages.Title: Fat Burning (Ketosis)
Stages.Description: Deep fat burning begins. HGH levels increase.

Stages.Title: Autophagy
Stages.Description: Cellular repair and recycling of old components.
